metadata.title: CVE-2016-4972 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: OpenStack Murano before 1.0.3 (liberty) and 2.x before 2.0.1 (mitaka), Murano-dashboard before 1.0.3 (liberty) and 2.x before 2.0.1 (mitaka), and python-muranoclient before 0.7.3 (liberty) and 0.8.x before 0.8.5 (mitaka) improperly use loaders inherited from yaml.Loader when parsing MuranoPL and UI files, which allows remote attackers to create arbitrary Python objects and execute arbitrary code via crafted extended YAML tags in UI definitions in packages.

criterions.comment: murano package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:3.0.0~b1-2').
murano-dashboard package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:2.0.0-5').
python-muranoclient package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.8.4-1').
